mapper.sql: id, majorid, name, type, state, isdel, createtime, updatetime, t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7, t8, t9, t10, t11, t12, t13, t14, t15, t16, t17, t18, t19, t20, t21, create_id, t22, t23
mapper.select:
SELECT bmt.`id`,bmt.majorid,NAME,type,state,bmt.isdel,bmt.createtime,bmt.updatetime,t1,t2,t3,t4,t5,t6,t7,t8,t9,t10,t11,t12,t13,t14,t15,t16,t17,t18,t19,t20,t21,bmt.create_id,score,t22,t23 FROM b_major_text bmt LEFT JOIN b_major_score bms ON bmt.majorId = bms.majorId AND bms.create_id = #{majorTextWapper.createId}
and t1 like concat('%',#{majorTextWapper.majorTextName},'%')
and t2 like concat('%',#{majorTextWapper.t2},'%')
ORDER BY bmt.`updatetime` DESC
